entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:58 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
